title: Consent
description: A group of flags that indicate the choices that have been made regarding how associated data may be used.

@id.title: Identifier
@id.description: The unique identifier for the consent.

xdm:i1.title: I1
xdm:i1.description: Data that can specifically identify or enable direct contact with an individual.

xdm:i2.title: I2
xdm:i2.description: Data that can be used in combination with any other data to identify or enable direct contact with an individual.

xdm:c1.title: C1
xdm:c1.description: Data can only be exported from Adobe Experience Cloud, in an aggregated form without including individual or device identifiers.

xdm:c2.title: C2
xdm:c2.description: Data cannot be exported to a 3rd party.

xdm:c3.title: C3
xdm:c3.description: Data cannot be used in conjunction with directly identifiable information.

xdm:c4.title: C4
xdm:c4.description: Data cannot be used for any targeting, including customer's own sites and apps.

xdm:c5.title: C5
xdm:c5.description: Data cannot be used for targeting on customer's own sites and apps.

xdm:c6.title: C6
xdm:c6.description: Data cannot be used for cross-site targeting.

xdm:c7.title: C7
xdm:c7.description: Data cannot be used for performance and optimization of customer's own website.

xdm:c8.title: C8
xdm:c8.description: Data cannot be used for Data Science Workflows.

xdm:c9.title: C9
xdm:c9.description: Data cannot be matched to off-line sources.

xdm:c10.title: C10
xdm:c10.description: Data cannot be used to create device graphs.

xdm:c11.title: C11
xdm:c11.description: Data cannot be used with Precise Geo Location data like S1.
